title: Coinbase, Marathon Digital, Lucid: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today; Bitcoin, ether and dogecoin prices were all down; crypto stocks were caught in the downdraft
text:
* Stocks in the crypto universe were caught in the downdraft. Bitcoin wallet provider Coinbase was down 5%, and bitcoin miners Marathon Digital and Riot Blockchain slid 6.8% and 11.6% respectively.

* Walmart is due to report before the opening bell.

* Home Depot shares were bouncing between small gains and losses premarket after the home-improvement retailer reported profit and same-store sales that beat forecasts.

* Lucid Group shares rose more than 2% premarket after the luxury electric-vehicle maker reported a jump in orders and forecast further increases this year.

* Unity Software shares dropped 3.6% premarket. The company after Monday's close proposed a $1.5 billion offering of convertible senior notes.

* Royalty Pharma shares jumped more than 10%. Berkshire Hathaway said Monday it had taken a stake in the company during the third quarter.

* Peloton shares dropped 4.8% premarket, extending losses since its disappointing earnings report earlier this month.

* Advance Auto Parts slipped 1% off hours after it reported a decrease in operating income during the third quarter.

* La-Z-Boy and Star Bulk Carriers are due to report after Tuesday's close.

Chart of the Day

* The tight supply and demand balance in the global oil market could be about to ease, the IEA said in its monthly report.

Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com

Coinbase, Marathon Digital, Lucid: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
